name: JavaProg - Core Java Programs
description: JavaProg is core java programs and examples app for the people who are looking for jobs in core Java development. Youre at the right place if you are looking for the best app for core Java programs for freshers and experience.  This app contains collection of more than 200+ most important core java programs in each topic of core Java along with examples.  We have put together the most frequently asked questions in an interview which will help you to crack your interview.  Programs and examples are from following topic: - Basic - patterns - String - Array - Strings - Class and Objects - Constructors - Inheritance - Interface - Polymorphism - Abstraction - Collection and Exception - Multi threading - Company interview question - Many more...  APP FEATURES: - Collection of more than 200+ most important core java programs and examples. - Full offline core java programs and examples. - Useful for freshers as well as experienced professionals. - Share your favorite JavaProg app with your friends, through social media, text, whatsapp, email etc. - No ads, no internet, no extra permission.  WHO ARE WE:  Being a small team, your responses are really great help for us to go in right direction. We are waiting to see your comments, feedback, suggestions, bugs on this release.  Give CAtoKg a try and let us know what do you think about us at catokgdotcom@gmail.com.
